mapper.insert: insert into activity (ACT_NO, MEM_ID, ACT_PHONE, ACT_STARTDAY, ACT_ENDDAY, ACT_PLACE, ACT_PEOPLE, ACT_REQUESTEND, ACT_CATEGORY, ACT_TITLE, ACT_PRICE, ACT_URL, ACT_CONTENT, ACT_GUIDE, ACT_COUNT, ACT_DATE, ACT_STATUS) VALUES (seq_actid.nextval, #{memId}, #{actPhone}, #{actStartday}, #{actEndday}, #{actPlace}, #{actPeople}, #{actRequestend}, #{actCategory}, #{actTitle}, #{actPrice}, #{actUrl}, #{actContent}, #{actGuide}, default, sysdate, default)
